extendedInfo.description: This application is intended to be used by filmmakers in the process of recording data about film shoots.  This stopwatch application will provide the time as well as the number of frames and length of film used in a given shot, all in one place.  Frame rate and type of film can be set by the user.All conversion rates were calculated based on the Kodak Film Calculator: http://www.kodak.com/US/plugins/flash/en/motion/filmCalculator.swfI will happily address any comments or concerns at gateswinkler@gmail.comThis is an ad supported free version, an ad free copy can be purchased at https://market.android.com/details?id=com.filmtimer&feature=search_result
